about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS DEMO

In this demo you will experience the beginning of the journey that Shadowveil: Legend of the Five Rings offers!

You will have access to all the classes of the game, including a large variety of both abilities and items, giving you several ways to build your party. During your journey you will venture into the Shadowlands and face off against some of the bosses.

Your demo-adventure ends after the full game's 2 main chapters, however the second chapter can be replayed endlessly to further explore unlocks, other classes, party combinations and strategies.
